pageContext.claim: “(Susan Rice is) not supposed to be doing that and what she did was wrong. We’ve been saying that. It’s just the tip of the iceberg. She wasn’t supposed to be doing that the unmasking and the surveillance. I heard she admitted that yesterday.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump mischaracterized media reports of what Susan Rice told House investigators. {According to CNN}, Rice explained to investigators the reason behind the unmasking of senior Trump White House officials, but she did not admit any wrongdoing. "I didn't hear anything to believe that she did anything illegal," Rep. Tom Rooney (R-Fla.), who is helping lead the House Russia investigation, told CNN after the meeting with Rice.
